extendedInfo.description: Enter the wildest fishing competition yet! Compete against the worldâs best for the biggest catch in up to 3 tournaments with 27 challenges! Cast your line in the Great Barrier Reef, Amazon, Loch Ness & more to reel in up to 28 kinds of fish, including Barracuda, Sharks & lots more! Brave a variety of tough weather and upgrade your bait & tackle to improve your luck in a quest to land the big one!FeaturesCompete in the wildest fishing competition yet! Enter up to 3 tournaments with 27 challenges to fish against the best from up to 16 different countriesCast your line in the worldâs best waters, like:The Great Coral Reef, Amazon, Loch Ness and more!Reel in up to 28 different types of fish, including:Barracuda, Sharks, Triggerfish and much more! Improve your bait, line and rod to catch more fish! Use your skills to keep on fishing through tough conditions like rain, wind, nightfall & more!

reviews.title: MOTHERF#*KER!
reviews.comment: Waste of time! Horrible game, developers should seek a more successful career, one they would have ACTUAL talent at....possibly bestiality porn? They spend so much time screwing their customers perhaps the occasional llama or border collie would benefit and developers could actually make an HONEST living! THIEVES!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hopelessly Poor!
reviews.comment: Digital Chocolate is a big name... It\'s dissapointing to see they r having a hard time figuring out how to fit the screen resolutions. Tis the first time I am noticing such a problem in any app. Now I know that even droid apps experience such problem, thanks for enlightening me... LOL... No change in the games from their java versions except the hopeless resolution bug ofcourse... Have they appointed lab monkeys as devs, coz 1st year interns would do much better... Digitals \'D\' is for DISAPPOINTMENT...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Catching a make with a cane pole.
reviews.comment: Lousy timing on notification bubbles, blocking power meter just when you most need to see it, and last tourney needs reworked. Won the first two, blowout. Not a round on final.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for a 5 year old!
reviews.comment: If you want good fishing games upload Big Sport Fishing Lite & the Big Sport Fishing Night Lite. If you really like them then purchase the full version. The full versions are not expensive. Personally I use the lite version cause it gives me enough of what I need & my husband has the full. It\'s the most life like fishing game I\'ve played.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Would be nice if you could reel on a shark faster. The opponent can always reel it right in but it takes half the time to do it without your line breaking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I liked it at first but I gets boring
